text:
Created attachment 32786
demo of the code that fails while creating document with image

I have to build a document .docx that includes an image.
But it does not work.

Attached you find my code.

In the code I try to add both a title and an image.
The result is an empty document.
If I remove the image, than the title is generated inside the document.

How could I fix it?
creator: giovanni.gaglione@gmail.com
michiel.verkaik@gmail.com
text: I was not able to reproduce this issue. I added a JPEG file from my local machine and it was embedded in the docx file just fine. Would be great if you could attach the image file you used as well as the empty docx. Also, what version of Word did you use?

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: No update for a long time and could not be reproduced easily, therefore closing until more information is provided. Please retry with the latest version and reopen this Bug if it still happens.
